generated_doNotEdit.title: Redstone Conductivity
generated_doNotEdit.description:
The basic redstone properties of a block; if the component is not provided the default values are used. Requires 1.21.30 format version and above.
Experimental toggles required: Upcoming Creator Features (in format versions before 1.21.30)

fields.title: Allows Wire To Step Down
fields.description: Specifies if redstone wire can stair-step downward on the block.

fields.title: Redstone Conductor
fields.description: Specifies if the block can be powered by redstone.
